name: .OWL File Extension
summary: Learn about .OWL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Source code written in OWL - the "Obfuscated Weird Language;" based on the Forth and FALSE programming languages; only supports integer numbers and 26 variables - A through Z.

content: OWL is written in C, using GNU extensions. OWL files can be run using the OWL interpreter, which can be installed on any system with gcc (the GNU Compiler Collection).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
